items.content_html: This project is a lightweight and user-friendly music player built entirely with JavaScript. It offers a seamless listening experience, allowing users to play, pause, skip, and control volume for their favorite audio tracks. The music player features responsive controls, dynamic playlist management, and visually appealing animations.
items.title: ChillWithKanwal/CodeAlpha_Music_player_using_JavaScript: This project is a lightweight and user-friendly music player built entirely with JavaScript. It offers a seamless listening experience, allowing users to play, pause, skip, and control volume for their favorite audio tracks. The music player features responsive controls, dynamic playlist management, and visually appealing animations.
